title: Trying to find a typeface
content:
So I’ve been looking for what seems like forever for a typeface that I’ve not been able to turn up as yet. I’d love to find the font used on the Sokol Blosser winery’s Evolution No. 9.

Here’s a link to a pic:

[http://sokolblosser.com/images/image\_library/Evolution-bottle\_349.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/sokolblosser.com/images/image_library/Evolution-bottle_349.jpg "http://sokolblosser.com/images/image\_library/Evolution-bottle\_349.jpg")

I’d apparently make a reasonably lousy private (or public, for that matter) detective as repeated attempts at locating this rogue typeface have turned up snake eyes. Welcome any guidance any of you may have. Thanks!

 [‹ whose eyes!!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29408 "Go to previous forum topic") [greek old style !! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19895 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kcntx

comments.content:
Neither are exact matches, but...

Font Bureau’s Antique Condensed is similar:  
 [http://fontbureau.com/fonts/AntiqueCondensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/AntiqueCondensed "http://fontbureau.com/fonts/AntiqueCondensed")

Red Rooster’s Grand Canyon has the outlined/shadow options:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/grand-canyon-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/grand-canyon-rr/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/grand-canyon-rr/")

FYI, you’ll get faster/greater response if you post these kinds of requests on the Type ID board.
Only a thousand times closer than I’d gotten on my own. Perfect. Thanks!

Reminds me of something from the Dover books. I thought it might be from [Solotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/solotype/), but didn’t find a match. For a similar look you might try something from [Archive Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226184646/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/archivetype/).
